message:
"Reconciliation at the Crossroad of Ashes"

Among grief's shadow, a somber dance,
Two souls exchanged in funeral trance.
Strangers in death, entwined by chance.
In these ashes, a peculiar romance,
Missteps bred a soul's second glance,
Labeled lost, yet found in their final stance.

An NHS board has apologised over the incident in which relatives held a funeral service after being given the body of a different person, who is not believed to have any surviving family members.
